Articles.Content:
first of all sorry for my English. I am Spanish and use google translator.

Hi, I wanted explcar like playing KSP with the PS4 and Europe, you only have to create a new account and put region usa. in my youtube channel you have the tutorial. the channel is tonicky things. why I not put the link do not want espamear. thank you very much and I hope they serve

Welcome to the forum, Tonicky.

Could you explain more about your question, please?

1 hour ago, Vanamonde said:

Welcome to the forum, Tonicky.

Could you explain more about your question, please? 

I don't think he is asking a question,  but instead telling people how to download ksp on ps4 in Europe by creating a new account on your ps4 and selecting your region as USA.
accurate, so do not speak English very well sorry.

first of all sorry for my English. I am Spanish and use google translator.

There is a reason that Sony Europe won't sell this game, it's in a dreadful state,  please don't promote it

19 hours ago, RW1984 said:

There is a reason that Sony Europe won't sell this game, it's in a dreadful state,  please don't promote it

the truth is that it fails a little, but I play every day and if it ever crashes do not care. I really like this type of game and just wanted to give information to people who like me like to play.

It is a great game and I have no pc to play the game to the PS4.
 

:):)
